jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Exercise robust analytical on P/L report particularly cost and expenses, understand the cost and expenses trends on month to month basis including the fluctuation analysis and variance analysis against budget
  • Monitor and control the costs and expenses disbursement, including the daily PO execution and provide a recommendation to increase cost efficiency and effectiveness
  • Monitor the effectiveness of above the line marketing spend and promotion budgets (sales incentives, cash backs, vouchers, etc)
  • Provide recommendation to increase cost efficiency and effectiveness
  • Approve commercial negotiations and work with the commercial team from inception of transactions through legal contract drafting – working alongside the internal legal team and the other senior leadership
  • Identify, aggregating and assigning cost and expenses under function to product by using relevant key-drivers in order to generate calculation of profitability report by product

• Minimum a Bachelor degree from a reputable university with major in Finance, Accountancy, Banking, Business Studies, Administration, Management or equivalent
  • At least 2 years of experience in a public accounting firm (Big 4 is preferable)
  • Knowledgeable in cost management concepts and terminologies, including cost allocation and define cost baseline
  • Has positive mind set, forward thinking attitude and possess "can do" attitude
  • Preference given to candidates that currently hold a similar position within a large established corporation
  • Bi-lingual skill Bahasa Indonesia and English
